mapper.select: select * from notice where (title like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%') or content like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')) order by num desc
mapper.insert: insert into notice (num, type, title, content, imageUrl, writeday) values (null, #{noticeType}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{uploadFile}, now())
mapper.select: select type, title, content from notice where num = #{num}
mapper.update: update notice set type = #{noticeType}, title = #{noticeTitle}, content = #{noticeContent},imageUrl = #{uploadFile} where num = #{num}
